page.title: 11The Legion Flats, Coleford
page.content: On the 25th June we went to the British Legion Flats at Douglas Yates Court, in Coleford. It was called that because a man who opened it was called Douglas Yates. First we had a drink of orange and some crisps then Mrs.Seymour showed us her flat.It has a bathroom, kitchen, and bedsit . They have a choice of colour scheme and she picked pink. Mrs Seymour has got two fridges because the big one makes too much noise and she can't get to sleep. In her bathroom there is a pole to help her get out of the bath. Then we went to see Mrs Jay's chair lift, and saw how it worked. Then it started to rain and a man offered us a lift back to school in his car.
